AcceptedFactionInvite.notes: Fires when receiving confirmation that a local player has accepted a faction invite.

parameters.name: faction
parameters.notes: Name of the faction.

parameters.name: username
parameters.notes: Username of the faction leader.

AcceptedSafehouseInvite.notes: Fires when a player accepts an invite to a safehouse.

parameters.name: safehouse
parameters.notes: Name of the safehouse.

parameters.name: username
parameters.notes: Username of the safehouse owner.

AcceptedTrade.notes: Fires when the other player in the client's current trade accepts or declines the trade.

parameters.name: accepted
parameters.notes: Whether the trade was accepted.

AddXP.notes: Fires after a local character gains perk XP, except when the XP source specifically requested not to.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who gained the XP.

parameters.name: perk
parameters.notes: The perk XP was gained in.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.notes: The amount of XP gained. This is the final value after all modifiers.

DoSpecialTooltip.notes: Fires when updating the tooltip of an IsoObject with a special tooltip. Used for hover-over information about plants.

parameters.name: tooltip
parameters.notes: Empty tooltip for the object.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: Square of the object the tooltip is being updated for.

EveryHours.notes: Fires at the start of every in-game hour.

LevelPerk.notes: Fires after a local character gains or loses a perk level.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character whose perk level changed.

parameters.name: perk
parameters.notes: The perk that changed level.

parameters.name: level
parameters.notes: The new level of the perk.

parameters.name: increased
parameters.notes: True if the level increased, false if it decreased.

LoadGridsquare.notes: Fires after a new square is loaded.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square that was loaded.

MngInvReceiveItems.notes: Fires when managing a remote player's inventory from the admin menu.

parameters.name: inventory
parameters.notes: Details of the player's inventory.

OnAIStateChange.notes: Fires when a local zombie or any loaded player changes state.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character whose state changed.

parameters.name: currentState
parameters.notes: The state the character changed to.

parameters.name: previousState
parameters.notes: The character's previous state.

OnAcceptInvite.notes: Fires when the client accepts a steam invite to a server.

parameters.name: connectString
parameters.notes: Steamworks connection string. Takes the format of '+connect ip:port'

onAddForageDefs.notes: Fires after the foraging item definitions are created.

parameters.name: forageSystem
parameters.notes: The foraging system.

OnAddMessage.notes: Fires when a message is added to chat.

parameters.name: message
parameters.notes: The message that was added.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.notes: The ID of the tab the message was added to.

OnAdminMessage.notes: Fires when a ticket is created and the local player is an admin.

parameters.name: message
parameters.notes: The text of the ticket.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: World X co-ordinate of the player who made the ticket.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: World Y co-ordinate of the player who made the ticket.

parameters.name: z
parameters.notes: World Z co-ordinate of the player who made the ticket.

OnAmbientSound.notes: Fires whenever a sound meta event or building alarm is triggered.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: World X co-ordinate of the sound.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: World Y co-ordinate of the sound.

parameters.name: z
parameters.notes: World Z co-ordinate of the sound.

OnCGlobalObjectSystemInit.notes: Fires when the client GlobalObject system is being initialised.

OnChallengeQuery.notes: Fires when the main menu wants to check for challenge maps.

OnCharacterCollide.notes: Fires when a non-zombie character collides into another (possibly zombie) character.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character colliding into the other character.

parameters.name: collidedCharacter
parameters.notes: The character being collided into.

OnCharacterDeath.notes: Fires when any character dies, including zombies and players regardless of whether they are local.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who died.

OnChatWindowInit.notes: Fires when the chat window is initialised.

OnClientCommand.notes: Fires when a client command sent through sendClientCommand is received by the server.

parameters.name: module
parameters.notes: The module the command was sent with.

parameters.name: command
parameters.notes: The command the command was sent with.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player who sent the command.

parameters.name: args
parameters.notes: The arguments table the command was sent with. If the table was empty, nil is passed instead.

OnClimateManagerInit.notes: Fires when the climate manager is initialised.

parameters.name: climateManager
parameters.notes: The climate manager.

parameters.name: climateManager
parameters.notes: The climate manager.

OnClimateTickDebug.notes: Fires every climate manager tick, but only on the client and only when debug mode is enabled.

parameters.name: climateManager
parameters.notes: The climate manager.

OnClothingUpdated.notes: Fires every time a character's clothing is updated. This includes changing clothes and accumulating dirt or blood.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character whose clothing updated.

OnConnectFailed.notes: Fires when the client fails to connect to a server.

OnConnected.notes: Fires after successfully connecting to a server on the main menu, before character creation begins.

OnConnectionStateChanged.notes: Fires when the client's connection state is updated while trying to connect to a server.

OnContainerUpdate.notes: Fires when a container is added or removed from the world.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The container that was added or removed.

OnCoopJoinFailed.notes: Fires when a splitscreen character fails to be added.

parameters.name: playerNum
parameters.notes: The index of the player who could not be added.

OnCoopServerMessage.notes: Fires when receiving a server message during a co-op (in-game hosted) game.

OnCreateLivingCharacter.notes: Fires when an IsoPlayer or IsoSurvivor object is created.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who was created.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.notes: The character's descriptor.

OnCreatePlayer.notes: Fires every time a local player loads into the world.

parameters.name: playerNum
parameters.notes: The player number of the newly-spawned character

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The new player object

OnCreateSurvivor.notes: Fires when an IsoSurvivor object is created.

parameters.name: survivor
parameters.notes: The survior that was created.

OnCreateUI.notes: Fires when the UI is initialised.

OnCustomUIKey.notes: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is released.

parameters.name: key
parameters.notes: Key code of the key that was pressed.

OnCustomUIKeyReleased.notes: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is released.

parameters.name: key
parameters.notes: Key code of the key that was pressed.

OnCustomUIKeyPressed.notes: Fires when a key that is not used by vanilla UI is pressed.

parameters.name: key
parameters.notes: Key code of the key that was pressed.

OnDestroyIsoThumpable.notes: Fires when an IsoThumpable object is destroyed by damage.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The thumpable that was destroyed.

OnDeviceText.notes: Fires whenever a radio displays text.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.notes: GUID of the line being displayed.

parameters.name: codes
parameters.notes: Codes of the line being displayed. These typically contain perk/stat changes, but can be used to associate any arbitrary data with a line.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: World X co-ordinate where the line is being displayed.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: World Y co-ordinate where the line is being displayed.

parameters.name: z
parameters.notes: World Z co-ordinate where the line is being displayed.

parameters.name: text
parameters.notes: The displayed, translated text of the line.

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: The device playing the line.

OnDisconnect.notes: Fires when the client disconnects from a server.

onDisableSearchMode.notes: Fires when a local player disables search mode.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character disabling search mode.

parameters.name: isSearchMode
parameters.notes: Always false.

OnDistributionMerge.notes: Fires when the distribution tables merge.

OnDoTileBuilding2.notes: Fires every tick while the local mouse and keyboard player has a build cursor (or other drag).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.notes: The build cursor object the player is dragging.

parameters.name: bRender
parameters.notes: Whether the preview should be rendered.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: World X co-ordinate of the square the build cursor is over.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: World Y co-ordinate of the square the build cursor is over.

parameters.name: z
parameters.notes: World Z co-ordinate of the square the build cursor is over.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square the build cursor is over.

OnDoTileBuilding3.notes: Fires every tick while a controller player has a build cursor (or other drag).

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.notes: The cursor object the player is dragging.

parameters.name: bRender
parameters.notes: Whether the preview should be rendered.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: World X co-ordinate of the square the build cursor is over.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: World Y co-ordinate of the square the build cursor is over.

parameters.name: z
parameters.notes: World Z co-ordinate of the square the build cursor is over.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square the build cursor is over.

OnDynamicMovableRecipe.notes: Fires when a local character crafts a dynamically generated Movable scrapping recipe.

parameters.name: sprite
parameters.notes: Sprite of the movable.

parameters.name: recipe
parameters.notes: The movable recipe that was crafted.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The movable item being scrapped.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character crafting the recipe.

onEnableSearchMode.notes: Fires when a local player enables search mode.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character disabling search mode.

parameters.name: isSearchMode
parameters.notes: Always true.

OnEnterVehicle.notes: Fires when a character enters a vehicle.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character that entered the vehicle.

OnEquipPrimary.notes: Fires when a character equips a new item in their primary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character that equipped the item.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item that was equipped.

OnEquipSecondary.notes: Fires when a character equips a new item in their secondary slot.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character that equipped the item.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item that was equipped.

OnExitVehicle.notes: Fires when a character exits a vehicle.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character that exited the vehicle.

OnFETick.notes: Fires every tick while on the main menu.

OnFillContainer.notes: Fires whenever a container is first filled with loot, or when loot respawns. Never fires for corpses.

parameters.name: roomType
parameters.notes: Distribution type of the room the container is in, or the type of the vehicle.

parameters.name: containerType
parameters.notes: The type of the container that was filled.

parameters.name: container
parameters.notes: The container that was filled.

OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires after the context menu for an inventory item is filled.

parameters.name: playerNum
parameters.notes: The number of the player whose context menu has been filled.

parameters.name: context
parameters.notes: The context menu that was filled.

parameters.name: items
parameters.notes: The items that were selected to fill the context menu. If only full stacks are selected, a table of ContextMenuItemStacks is passed. Otherwise it is a table of InventoryItems.

onFillSearchIconContextMenu.notes: Fires when opening the context menu for a foraging item.

parameters.name: context
parameters.notes: The foraging context menu.

parameters.name: icon
parameters.notes: The foraging icon the context menu was created for.

OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires after a world context menu is filled.

parameters.name: playerNum
parameters.notes: The number of the player whose context menu has been filled.

parameters.name: context
parameters.notes: The context menu that was filled.

parameters.name: worldObjects
parameters.notes: The objects that were right clicked on. The first object is whatever the mouse click hit directly. If one can be found, it will also add a door, a window, a window frame, a thumpable, a hoppable, and a tree. Many kinds of objects will never appear in this list or appear inconsistently so it is a common pattern to get the square from the first object and then loop through its objects.

parameters.name: test
parameters.notes: Whether the context menu was filled to test for interactive objects on the square. If true, the context menu will not actually be displayed.

OnGameBoot.notes: Fires after the game finishes starting up. Note: For clients, lua files in lua/server/ will not have loaded by the time this event is fired. This does not apply to servers.

OnGameStart.notes: Fires upon finishing loading and entering the game.

OnGameStateEnter.notes: Fires upon entering the Terms Of Service game state.

OnGamepadConnect.notes: Fires after a controller is connected.

parameters.name: controllerId
parameters.notes: ID of the controller.

OnGamepadDisconnect.notes: Fires after a controller is disconnected.

parameters.name: controllerId
parameters.notes: ID of the controller.

OnGetDBSchema.notes: Fires when receiving the database schema from the server.

OnGetTableResult.notes: Fires when receiving a database table query result from the server.

OnGridBurnt.notes: Fires when a square is burned by fire.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square that was burned.

OnHitZombie.notes: Fires whenever a zombie is hit by a character.

parameters.name: zombie
parameters.notes: The zombie that was hit.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The character that hit the zombie.

parameters.name: bodyPart
parameters.notes: The type of the body part that was hit.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon the zombie was hit with.

OnInitGlobalModData.notes: Fires when GlobalModData is initialised. This is the earliest event after Sandbox Options are loaded.

parameters.name: newGame
parameters.notes: True if this is the first time the save has started.

OnInitModdedWeatherStage.notes: Fires when a modded weather period is created.

parameters.name: weatherPeriod
parameters.notes: The weather period that was created.

parameters.name: weatherStage
parameters.notes: The weather stage that was created.

parameters.name: strength
parameters.notes: TODO

parameters.name: recordedMedia
parameters.notes: The RecordedMedia object.

OnInitSeasons.notes: Fires when the ErosionManager is created.

OnInitWorld.notes: Fires after the world has initialised.

onItemFall.notes: Fires when a local character is forced to drop the items in their hands.

OnJoypadActivate.notes: Fires whenever a controller starts being used during gameplay.

parameters.name: joypadId
parameters.notes: ID of the joypad.

OnJoypadActivateUI.notes: Fires whenever a controller starts being used outside of gameplay, such as on the main menu.

parameters.name: joypadId
parameters.notes: ID of the joypad.

OnJoypadBeforeDeactivate.notes: Fires when a controller is disconnected, before disconnection is processed.

parameters.name: joypadId
parameters.notes: ID of the joypad.

OnJoypadBeforeReactivate.notes: Fires when a controller is connected, before connection is processed.

parameters.name: joypadId
parameters.notes: ID of the joypad.

OnJoypadDeactivate.notes: Fires after a controller has been disconnected.

parameters.name: joypadId
parameters.notes: ID of the joypad.

OnJoypadReactivate.notes: Fires after a controller has been connected.

parameters.name: joypadId
parameters.notes: ID of the joypad.

OnJoypadRenderUI.notes: Fires when rendering controller debug UI.

OnKeyKeepPressed.notes: Fires every frame while a key is held down.

parameters.name: key
parameters.notes: Key code of the key that was held.

OnKeyPressed.notes: Fires when a key is released.

parameters.name: key
parameters.notes: Key code of the key that was released.

OnKeyStartPressed.notes: Fires when a key starts being pressed.

parameters.name: key
parameters.notes: Key code of the key that was pressed.

OnLoad.notes: Fires upon finishing loading and entering the game.

OnLoadedMapZones.notes: Fires after loading the map zones.

OnLoadedTileDefinitions.notes: Fires after loading the tile definitions.

parameters.name: spriteManager
parameters.notes: The sprite manager.

OnLoadMapZones.notes: Fires before loading the map zones.

onLoadModDataFromServer.notes: Fires when the server sends a square's mod data to the clients, or when the client receives it.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square that had its mod data updated.

OnLoadRadioScripts.notes: Fires after ZomboidRadio loads the radio scripts.

parameters.name: scriptManager
parameters.notes: The radio script manager.

parameters.name: newGame
parameters.notes: True when a new save launches for the first time.

OnLoadSoundBanks.notes: Fires after the game loads the FMOD sound banks.

OnMainMenuEnter.notes: Fires upon entering the main menu.

OnMechanicActionDone.notes: Fires after a character completes a mechanic action on a vehicle.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who performed the action.

parameters.name: success
parameters.notes: Whether the action succeeded.

parameters.name: vehicleId
parameters.notes: The ID of the vehicle that was operated on.

parameters.name: partType
parameters.notes: The type of the part that was operated on.

OnMiniScoreboardUpdate.notes: Fires when the admin mini-scoreboard is updated.

OnModsModified.notes: Fires on the main menu when a mod's files have changed.

OnMouseDown.notes: Fires when the player left clicks, as long as the input isn't eaten by UI.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnMouseMove.notes: Fires every frame, unless mouse movement is eaten by something else.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: xMultiplied
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click multiplied by zoom level.

parameters.name: yMultiplied
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click multiplied by zoom level.

OnMouseUp.notes: Fires whenever the player releases the left mouse button, unless the input is eaten by UI.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnMultiTriggerNPCEvent.notes: Fires when the player triggers an NPC event.

OnNewFire.notes: Fires when a new fire is started.

parameters.name: fire
parameters.notes: The fire that was created.

OnNewGame.notes: Fires whenever a local player character is created for the first time.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The character that was created.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square the character spawned on.

OnObjectAboutToBeRemoved.notes: Fires before a tile object is destroyed or picked up.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object about to be removed.

OnObjectAdded.notes: Fires when an object is added to the world. Note: usually not called on the client, but is in some cases.

OnObjectCollide.notes: Fires when two objects collide with each other.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object that collided into the other object.

parameters.name: collided
parameters.notes: The object that was collided into.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown.notes: Fires when the player left clicks a world object.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object that was clicked.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp.notes: Fires when the player releases left click on a world object.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object that was clicked.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown.notes: Fires when the player right clicks a world object.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object that was clicked.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp.notes: Fires when the player releases right click on a world object.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object that was clicked.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnPlayerAttackFinished.notes: Fires when a local player finishes attacking.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player who attacked.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon the player attacked with.

OnPlayerDeath.notes: Fires when a local player dies.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player who died.

OnPlayerGetDamage.notes: Fires every time a local player takes damage. Bleeding bodyparts fire the event once per frame each. It also fires when zombies are hit by weapons: this is the only case in which the event fires on the server.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who took damage.

parameters.name: damageType
parameters.notes: The type of damage the character took.

parameters.name: damage
parameters.notes: The damage that was taken.

OnPlayerMove.notes: Fires during each local player's update if they are walking.

OnPlayerUpdate.notes: Fires during each local player's update (every tick).

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player being updated.

OnPostDistributionMerge.notes: Fires after the distribution tables have been merged.

OnPostFloorLayerDraw.notes: Fires after a floor layer has been rendered.

parameters.name: z
parameters.notes: The Z level that was rendered.

OnPostMapLoad.notes: Fires after the map has been loaded.

parameters.name: cell
parameters.notes: The cell that was loaded.

OnPostRender.notes: Fires after every in-game rendering frame.

OnPostSave.notes: Fires after saving and exiting the game.

OnPostUIDraw.notes: Fires after every UI render frame

OnPreDistributionMerge.notes: Fires after the distribution tables have been merged.

OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires when the context menu for an inventory item is created, before it is filled.

parameters.name: playerNum
parameters.notes: The number of the player whose context menu has been created.

parameters.name: context
parameters.notes: The context menu that was created.

parameters.name: items
parameters.notes: The items that were selected to fill the context menu. If only full stacks are selected, a table of ContextMenuItemStacks is passed. Otherwise it is a table of InventoryItems.

OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu.notes: Fires after the world context menu is created, before it is filled.

parameters.name: playerIndex
parameters.notes: The number of the player whose context menu has been created.

parameters.name: context
parameters.notes: The context menu that was created.

parameters.name: worldobjects
parameters.notes: The objects that were selected.

parameters.name: test
parameters.notes: Whether the context menu was created to test for interactive objects on the square. If true, the context menu will not actually be displayed.

OnPreMapLoad.notes: Fires before the map starts loading.

OnPressRackButton.notes: Fires when a local player has a gun and presses the button to rack it.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player attempting to rack.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon they are attempting to rack.

OnPressReloadButton.notes: Fires when a local player has a gun and presses the button to reload it.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player attempting to reload.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon they are attempting to reload.

OnPressWalkTo.notes: Fires when the local player 1 presses their Walk To keybind.

parameters.name: arg0
parameters.notes: Always zero.

parameters.name: arg1
parameters.notes: Always zero.

parameters.name: arg2
parameters.notes: Always zero.

OnPreUIDraw.notes: Fires before every UI render frame

OnReceiveGlobalModData.notes: Fires when receiving a global mod data table.

parameters.name: key
parameters.notes: The key of the mod data table that was requested.

parameters.name: data
parameters.notes: The mod data table that was returned. False if there was no mod data table by that key.

OnReceiveItemListNet.notes: Fires when receiving a list of items sent with sendItemListNet. This is not used by vanilla, it is provided for mods to use. Item lists sent by clients cannot be longer than 50 items and all of the items must be in the player's inventory.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.notes: The player who sent the item list. Nil if it was sent by the server.

parameters.name: items
parameters.notes: The list of items.

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.notes: The specific local player the list was sent to. Nil if it was sent by a client to the server, or by the server to all clients.

parameters.name: transferID
parameters.notes: Arbitrary string associated with the message. Defaults to -1 if none was given.

parameters.name: custom
parameters.notes: Arbitrary string associated with the message. Nil if none was given.

OnReceiveUserlog.notes: Fires when receiving another client's Userlogs.

OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers.notes: Fires when the available containers in the inventory UI change.

OnResetLua.notes: Fires after Lua has been reloaded.

OnResolutionChange.notes: Fires whenever the window resolution changes.

parameters.name: oldX
parameters.notes: Previous width of the window.

parameters.name: oldY
parameters.notes: Previous height of the window.

parameters.name: newX
parameters.notes: New width of the window.

parameters.name: newY
parameters.notes: New height of the window.

OnRightMouseDown.notes: Fires when the player right clicks, as long as the input isn't eaten by UI.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnRightMouseUp.notes: Fires whenever the player releases the right mouse button, unless the input is eaten by UI.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: Screen X co-ordinate of the click.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: Screen Y co-ordinate of the click.

OnSafehousesChanged.notes: Fires every time a safehouse is added, removed or changed.

OnSave.notes: Fires while saving the world, after characters and sandbox options have been saved, but before global mod data and the world have been saved.

OnScoreboardUpdate.notes: Fires when the client receives an update to the in-game scoreboard.

OnSeeNewRoom.notes: Fires when a room becomes visible for the first time.

parameters.name: room
parameters.notes: The room.

OnServerCommand.notes: Fires when a server command sent through sendServerCommand is received by the client.

parameters.name: module
parameters.notes: The module the command was sent with.

parameters.name: command
parameters.notes: The command the command was sent with.

parameters.name: args
parameters.notes: The arguments table the command was sent with. If the table was empty, nil is passed instead.

OnServerFinishSaving.notes: Fires when the server has finished saving and unpauses the game.

OnServerStarted.notes: Fires when the server has started and can now be connected to.

OnServerStartSaving.notes: Fires when the server has paused the game to save.

OnServerStatisticReceived.notes: Fires when the MPStatistics have been received from the server.

OnServerWorkshopItems.notes: Fires when receiving an update about the server's Steam Workshop items while connecting.

OnSetDefaultTab.notes: Fires when the player sets their favourite chat window tab.

OnSGlobalObjectSystemInit.notes: Fires when the server GlobalObject system has been initialised.

OnSpawnRegionsLoaded.notes: Fires when the spawn regions have been loaded.

OnSteamFriendStatusChanged.notes: Fires when the player has gained or lost a steam friend.

parameters.name: steamID
parameters.notes: Steam ID of the friend who was gained/lost.

OnSteamGameJoin.notes: Fires when the player joins a game through steam.

OnSteamRefreshInternetServers.notes: Fires when the steam server list has been refreshed.

OnSteamRulesRefreshComplete.notes: Fires after a server's rules are retrieved.

parameters.name: rules
parameters.notes: Table of information about the server TODO: investigate what this actually is, class definition?

OnSteamServerResponded.notes: Fires when receiving a server for the server list.

OnSteamServerResponded2.notes: Fires when receiving a server for the favourite server list.

OnSteamWorkshopItemCreated.notes: Fires when the client successfully uploads a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotCreated.notes: Fires when the client fails to upload a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemNotUpdated.notes: Fires when the client fails to update a workshop item.

OnSteamWorkshopItemUpdated.notes: Fires when the client successfully updates a workshop item.

OnSwitchVehicleSeat.notes: Fires when a local character moves seats in a vehicle.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who moved seats.

OnTabAdded.notes: Fires when a tab is added to the chat.

OnTabRemoved.notes: Fires when a tab is removed from the chat.

OnThrowableExplode.notes: Fires when a throwable or trap explodes.

parameters.name: throwable
parameters.notes: The explosive.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square it exploded on.

OnThunderEvent.notes: Fires when a thunder event is enqueued.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: World X co-ordinate where the thunder event will happen.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: World Y co-ordinate where the thunder event will happen.

parameters.name: strike
parameters.notes: Whether the thunder event will make a striking sound.

parameters.name: light
parameters.notes: Whether the thunder event will create light.

parameters.name: rumble
parameters.notes: Whether the thunder event will make a rumbling sound.

parameters.name: tick
parameters.notes: The number of ticks since the game started.

OnTickEvenPaused.notes: Fires every game tick, even if the game is paused.

parameters.name: tick
parameters.notes: The number of ticks since the game started. Always zero while paused.

OnTileRemoved.notes: Fires when a tile object is removed.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object being removed.

onToggleSearchMode.notes: Fires when a local player toggles search mode.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character toggling search mode.

parameters.name: isSearchMode
parameters.notes: Whether search mode is now on or off.

OnTriggerNPCEvent.notes: Fires when the player triggers an NPC event.

onUpdateIcon.notes: Fires when an ISForageIcon is moved or removed.

OnUpdateModdedWeatherStage.notes: Fires when a modded weather stage tries to be updated.

OnUseVehicle.notes: Fires when a local character enters or exits a vehicle.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character using the vehicle.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle being used.

parameters.name: pressedNotTapped
parameters.notes: True if the button was held for a short duration, false if the button was tapped.

OnVehicleDamageTexture.notes: Fires when a vehicle part has become damaged enough to gain a damage overlay.

parameters.name: driver
parameters.notes: The character driving the vehicle.

OnWaterAmountChange.notes: Fires when the amount of water in an object changes.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object which has gained/lost water.

parameters.name: previousAmount
parameters.notes: The amount of water the object had before the change.

OnWeaponHitCharacter.notes: Fires when a non-zombie character is hit by an attack from a local player.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The character who attacked.

parameters.name: target
parameters.notes: The character who was hit by the attack.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon that was attacked with.

parameters.name: damage
parameters.notes: How much damage the attack did. TODO: what does this actually mean? injuries?

OnWeaponHitThumpable.notes: Fires when an IsoThumpable is hit by an attack.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The character attacking the object.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon the object was attacked with.

parameters.name: object
parameters.notes: The object that was attacked.

OnWeaponHitTree.notes: Fires when a tree is hit by an attack.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The character hitting the tree.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon the tree was hit with.

OnWeaponHitXp.notes: Fires when XP is being granted for an attack.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The character who attacked.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon the character attacked with.

parameters.name: target
parameters.notes: The target of the attack.

parameters.name: damage
parameters.notes: The damage of the attack.

OnWeaponSwing.notes: Fires when a player begins swinging a weapon.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The character attacking.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon being attacked with.

OnWeaponSwingHitPoint.notes: Fires when a local player's attack connects.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The player attacking.

parameters.name: weapon
parameters.notes: The weapon being attacked with.

OnWeatherPeriodComplete.notes: Fires when a weather period finishes.

OnWeatherPeriodStage.notes: Fires when a weather period progresses a stage.

OnWeatherPeriodStart.notes: Fires when a weather period begins.

OnWeatherPeriodStop.notes: Fires when a weather period ends early, such as by an admin command.

OnWorldSound.notes: Fires whenever a world sound is created.

parameters.name: x
parameters.notes: World X co-ordinate of the square the sound was created on.

parameters.name: y
parameters.notes: World Y co-ordinate of the square the sound was created on.

parameters.name: z
parameters.notes: World Z co-ordinate of the square the sound was created on.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.notes: Radius of the sound.

parameters.name: volume
parameters.notes: Volume of the sound. Zombies are more likely to investigate louder sounds when they have multiple choices.

parameters.name: source
parameters.notes: The source of the sound.

OnZombieDead.notes: Fires when a zombie dies. The zombie's inventory is not filled with loot when this event fires, but their clothing and attached items are added. The corpse does not exist until a few seconds later.

parameters.name: zombie
parameters.notes: The zombie that died.

parameters.name: zombie
parameters.notes: The zombie being updated.

preAddCatDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes item category definitions.

parameters.name: system
parameters.notes: The foraging system.

preAddForageDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes any definitions.

parameters.name: system
parameters.notes: The foraging system.

preAddItemDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes item definitions.

parameters.name: system
parameters.notes: The foraging system.

preAddSkillDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes trait and profession definitions.

parameters.name: system
parameters.notes: The foraging system.

preAddZoneDefs.notes: Fires before the foraging system processes zone definitions.

parameters.name: system
parameters.notes: The foraging system.

ReceiveFactionInvite.notes: Fires when the client receives a faction invite.

ReceiveSafehouseInvite.notes: Fires when the client receives a safehouse invite.

RequestTrade.notes: Fires when the client receives a trade request.

ReuseGridsquare.notes: Fires before a square is unloaded.

parameters.name: square
parameters.notes: The square being reused.

SendCustomModData.notes: Fires when a client is requesting server mod data.

ServerPinged.notes: Fires when receiving a ping response from the server. The 'numClients' string is suffixed with '/512'.

SwitchChatStream.notes: Fires when the client switches chat tabs.

SyncFaction.notes: Fires when the client receives changes to a faction.

TradingUIAddItem.notes: Fires when the other player in a trade adds an item.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player who added the item.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item that was added.

TradingUIRemoveItem.notes: Fires when the other player in a trade removes an item.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player who removed the item.

parameters.name: index
parameters.notes: The index of the removed item.

TradingUIUpdateState.notes: Fires when the other player in a trade changes the state of the trade.

parameters.name: player
parameters.notes: The player changing the state.

parameters.name: state
parameters.notes: The new state. TODO: enum for this

ViewTickets.notes: Fires when receiving the list of tickets from the server.

parameters.name: unknown
parameters.notes: When type is "dropOnFloor", has field IsoGridSquare "square". When type is "rotateMoveable" or "placeMoveable", has field string "direction"

parameters.name: message
parameters.notes: The message that was added.

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.notes: The ID of the tab the message was added to.

Attack.notes: Called every tick while a local character is pressing their attack button and is able to attack.

parameters.name: attacker
parameters.notes: The character attempting to attack.

AutoDrink.notes: Called whenever a character automatically drinks while auto-drink is turned on.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character auto-drinking.

CalculateStats.notes: Called when a character's stats are being updated. Character health is not included.

WeaponHitCharacter.notes: Called when the effects of an attack are being calculated.

WeaponSwing.notes: Called when a weapon is swung to find targets

ContextualAction.notes: TODO!! this one looks actually useful!!

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item being created

Item_OnCreate.notes: Called when the item is first created, before it is placed into its container. Generally used to initialise items.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item being cooked

Item_OnCooked.notes: Called when the item is cooked. Does not fire if the item has a ReplaceOnCooked as the item is destroyed. OnCooked functions *cannot* be inside tables or the game will not find them.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item being eaten

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character eating the item

parameters.name: amount
parameters.notes: The fraction of the item that was eaten.

Item_OnEat.notes: Called when a player eats the item. Called on the client eating the item only.

parameters.name: container
parameters.notes: The container the item is being added to

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item being added to the container

returns.notes: Whether to allow the item in the container
returns.name: acceptItem

Item_AcceptItemFunction.notes: Called when checking if an item is allowed inside a container with this function assigned. The container's OnlyAcceptCategory will be checked first if it has one.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item being tested.

returns.notes: Whether to allow the item in the recipe.
returns.name: test

CraftRecipe_OnTest.notes: Called when checking if an item can be used in the recipe.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character crafting the recipe. Recipes started by a workstation will pass nil.

CraftRecipe_OnStart.notes: Called at the start of crafting the recipe.

CraftRecipe_OnUpdate.notes: Called every tick while crafting the recipe.

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who crafted the recipe. Recipes started by a workstation wil pass nil.

CraftRecipe_OnCreate.notes: Called when successfully crafting the recipe.

CraftRecipe_OnFailed.notes: Called when failing to craft the recipe.

parameters.name: recipe
parameters.notes: The recipe being checked

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character the recipe is being checked for

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item the player right clicked to see this recipe. Null when checking whether to show the recipe in the crafting menu, but will be checked with the item set during crafting.

returns.notes: Whether to allow the character to craft the recipe
returns.name: canPerform

Recipe_OnCanPerform.notes: Called when checking if a character is able to perform the recipe - before showing the option to craft it, and every tick during crafting.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item being checked

parameters.name: result
parameters.notes: The result of the recipe

returns.notes: Whether to allow the item into the recipe
returns.name: test

Recipe_OnTest.notes: Called when checking if an item is allowed to be used in a recipe.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.notes: The items used to craft the recipe

parameters.name: result
parameters.notes: The item crafted by the recipe. Passed even if RemoveResultItem is set

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who crafted the recipe

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item used in the crafting action. This is either the item that was right clicked to start the crafting, or the first source item if it was crafted from the recipe menu.

parameters.name: isPrimaryHandItem
parameters.notes: True if item is equipped in the player's primary hand

parameters.name: isSecondaryHandItem
parameters.notes: True if item is equipped in the player's secondary hand

parameters.name: recipe
parameters.notes: The recipe that was crafted

parameters.name: sources
parameters.notes: The items used to craft the recipe

parameters.name: result
parameters.notes: The item crafted by the recipe. Passed even if RemoveResultItem is set

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character who crafted the recipe

parameters.name: outItems
parameters.notes: An empty ArrayList to be filled with items.

Recipe_GetItemTypes.notes: Called by the recipe manager for every recipe source after the lua/server/ folder loads. The ArrayList should be filled with Item objects to include as part of the recipe source.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being initialised

VehiclePart_init.notes: Called every time the part loads in or is reset.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being created

VehiclePart_create.notes: Called when the part is spawned for the first time.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being checked

returns.notes: Whether the engine should be working
returns.name: working

VehiclePart_checkEngine.notes: Called every tick while the engine is running. If any part returns false the engine will immediately shut off.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being checked

VehiclePart_checkOperate.notes: Called every tick while a player is in the driver's seat and able to drive. If any part returns false the player will not be able to control the vehicle.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being updated

parameters.name: deltaMinutes
parameters.notes: The number of minutes since the last update

VehiclePart_update.notes: Called regularly to update the part, targeting a rate of every half an in-game minute (1.25 seconds on 1 hour days).

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being used

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character using the part

VehiclePart_use.notes: Called when a character interacts with the vehicle while in the part's area.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being tested

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character using the part

returns.notes: Whether the part can be installed
returns.name: test

VehiclePart_Install_test.notes: Called when testing if the part can be installed.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part that was installed

VehiclePart_Install_complete.notes: Called after the part is successfully installed.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part being tested

parameters.name: character
parameters.notes: The character using the part

returns.notes: Whether the part can be uninstalled
returns.name: test

VehiclePart_Uninstall_test.notes: Called when testing if the part can be uninstalled.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.notes: The vehicle the part belongs to

parameters.name: part
parameters.notes: The part that was uninstalled

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item that was removed

VehiclePart_Uninstall_complete.notes: Called after the part is successfully uninstalled.

parameters.name: item
parameters.notes: The item being tested.

returns.notes: Whether the item is a valid match.
returns.name: allowItem

ItemContainer_Predicate.notes: Used by the -Eval methods in ItemContainer. These methods will only consider items that this function returns true for.

parameters.name: a
parameters.notes: The first item being tested.

parameters.name: b
parameters.notes: The second item being tested.

returns.notes: This should be positive if a should be prioritised over b, and negative if b should be prioritised.

ItemContainer_Comparator.notes: Used by the getBest methods in ItemContainer. These methods will sort all matches using this function, and return the item in first place.
